participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative, optimistic, and passionate about storytelling.
participant_1.background: I try to go for a walk every day, but it can be difficult because I can't see well. I like to play volleyball. I loved playing outside with my friends and riding my bike. I want to become an author. I enjoy listening to music with my brother and going to concerts.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.background: I keep my blue and hazel eyes open and take mental notes of the world around me. I'm afraid of not being able to beat my competitors in the marathon. I hate Mexican food. During the week, I work as a barista. I am in good shape and my weight is healthy.

content.text: Hello, I'm going for a walk to the park. Want to come?
Sounds fun, but I have to work. I have a marathon coming up and I need to train.
That's great! I used to run marathons, but I hurt my eye and can't see well enough to run anymore.
That's too bad. I hope you get better.
I'm a barista during the week. What do you do?
I'm a writer. I'm trying to get my first book published.
That's awesome! I love to read.
Thanks. I love to write. I hope to write a book that everyone will love to read.
I'm sure you will. You seem like a talented writer.
Thank you! That's really nice to hear.
